verses.verse: On the twenty-first of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> by <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9611>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4310>'Who<s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> among you <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>temple<s%> in its <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%>? And <S%H4100>how<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H6258>now<s%>? Does it not <S%H5869>seem<s%> to you like <S%H369>nothing<s%> in <S%H3644>comparison<s%>?

'But <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>courage,<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2388>'take<s%> <S%H2388>courage<s%> also, <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>courage,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and <S%H6213>work;<s%> for I am with you,' <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

'As for the <S%H1697>promise<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> you when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> is <S%H5975>abiding<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst;<s%> do not <S%H3372>fear!<s%>'

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H259>'Once<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while,<s%> I am going to <S%H7493>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> also and the <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>land.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and they will <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H2532>wealth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H9202>glory,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
'The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is Mine, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> is Mine,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

'The <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> will be <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7223>former,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'and in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%> "

On the twenty-fourth of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> [month,] in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7592>'Ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> [for] a ruling: <S%H8451><s%>

<S%H2005>'If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5375>carries<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>meat<s%> in the <S%H3671>fold<s%> of his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with this <S%H3671>fold,<s%> or <S%H5138>cooked<s%> <S%H5138>food,<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> [other] <S%H3978>food,<s%> will it <S%H6942>become<s%> <S%H6942>holy<s%>?' "And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No.<s%>"

Then <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> one who is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> from a <S%H5315>corpse<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these,<s%> will [the latter] <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%>?" And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It will <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>"

Then <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3651>"'So<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%> And <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> they <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

'But <S%H6258>now,<s%> do <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4605>onward:<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H2962><s%> one <S%H68>stone<s%> was <S%H7760>placed<s%> on <S%H68>another<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

from that <S%H1961>time<s%> [when] one <S%H935>came<s%> to a [grain] <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H6333>[measures,<s%>] there would be only <S%H6235>ten;<s%> and [when] one <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat<s%> to <S%H2834>draw<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> measures, there would be [only] <S%H6242>twenty.<s%>

'I <S%H5221>smote<s%> you [and] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> with <S%H9584>blasting<s%> <S%H9584>wind,<s%> <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> and <S%H1259>hail;<s%> yet you [did] not [come back] to Me,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Do <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4605>onward,<s%> from the twenty-fourth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> [month]; from the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H3245>founded,<s%> <S%H7760>consider<s%>: <S%H3824><s%>

'Is the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> in the <S%H4035>barn<s%>? <S%H5704>Even<s%> <S%H5704>including<s%> the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree,<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> and the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> it has not <S%H5375>borne<s%> [fruit.] Yet from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> on I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> [you.]' "

Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time<s%> to <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> on the twenty-fourth [day] of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I am going to <S%H7493>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'And I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2392>power<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and their <S%H7392>riders,<s%> and the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and their <S%H7392>riders<s%> will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H251>another.<s%>'

'On that <S%H3117>day,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you, <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> you like a <S%H2368>signet<s%> [ring,] for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you,'" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
